content:
That's great to hear that the one-touch rule has been working well for you in the kitchen!

As for your trash and recycling schedule, I'm happy to help... but I'm a large language model, I don't have access to your personal schedule or specific information about your trash and recycling pickup days. You might want to check your local waste management website, your city's website, or your trash and recycling bins for the schedule. It's usually printed on the bins or available online.

If you're still unsure, you could also try setting a reminder on your phone or putting a note on your fridge to remind you which day to take out the trash and recycling.

Remember, staying organized and on top of tasks like this can make a big difference in keeping your home tidy and running smoothly!
